snippet: Trailing by 4 points going into Sunday’s matches, Europe mounted a stunning comeback against the United States to retain the Ryder Cup, beating the host team with late-hole heroics.
abstract: Europe mounts a stunning comeback against the United States to retain the Ryder Cup, beating the host team with late-hole heroics.
lead_paragraph: Trailing by 4 points going into Sunday’s matches, Europe mounted a stunning comeback against the United States to retain the Ryder Cup, beating the host team with late-hole heroics.

headline.seo: Europe Rallies for Stunning Victory at Ryder Cup
headline.main: Home Is Where the Heartbreak Is
headline.print_headline: Home Is Where the Heartbreak Is
